short_description.en: The Energy Savings Assistance Program (ESA), offered to income-qualified customers, provides energy-saving improvements at no charge.
Make home more comfortable with energy efficient improvements and by purchasing Energy StarÂ® certified appliances.
Rebate for the costs of purchasing and installing one or two Level 2 charging stations, including the electric panel if an upgrade is needed.
Rebate for home weatherization measures.
Rebate for home weatherization measures.
Up to $1,000 per ton for a Central heat pump HVAC.
Up to $1,000 per ton for a Central heat pump HVAC.
Up to $1,500 for a heat pump water heater.
Up to $200 for a heat pump clothers dryer.
Up to $500 for an electric range with induction or electric cooktop.
A new electrical panel may be necessary to support new electric appliances, EVs and solar. Must contact BWP to determine qualification.
Purchase a new electric bicycle (e-bike) and you may be eligible for a cash rebate up to $300.
$200 rebate on E-bike purchase cost $1,000 - $1,999.99.
$50 rebate on installation of new ENERGY STAR-certified Electric Clothes Dryer in current residence.
Earn up to $1,500 when you upgrade your electric panel.
Earn a rebate up to $500 after the installation of a new level 2 Electric Vehicle Charger.
$500 rebate for income qualified AMP customers installing solar in their homes.
Variable rebates while supplies last.
Earn up to $6,000 as a rebate for purchasing a used electric vehicle.
Earn up to $1,500 for switching from natural gas to an electric heat pump.

$50 rebate for ENERGY STAR Certified smart thermostat.
Rebates for installation costs and upgrades of Level 2 EV chargers. Up to $500 for non-program participants and up to $1,000 for networked chargers with enrollment in time-based rates.
$0.35 per square foot rebate for new fire resistant attic insulation.
Up to $2,300 rebate for residents who replace an existing water heater with a new, efficient, electric heat pump water heater.
Up to $10,000 rebate available to help cover the costs incurred for infrastructure upgrades directly related to EV charger installations.
Earn a $250 per ton rebate up to 100% of the cost to purchase and install a new qualifying air source heat pump.
Earn a $250 per ton rebate up to 100% of the cost to purchase and install a new qualifying air source heat pump.
Earn up to $50 as a rebate for the purchase and installation of a new qualifying smart thermostat to replace an existing non-connected, manual, or programmable thermostat.  Limit 2 per household..
Save up to $500 on heat pump water heater replacing an electric water heater.
Up to $1599 rebate for installing an electric vehicle charging station with electric panel upgrade.
Earn $300 as a rebate for a new e-bike purchase.
